attributes.action: Rules about flags at Wembley Stadium
attributes.additional_details:
Wembley Stadium officials will only allow flags and banners 2.5 metres at their longest or widest section to be displayed at sporting events if:
- a fee of £1500 has been paid (for the staffing costs of specially trained flag management stewards) and
- a Health & Safety business proposal has been submitted and signed off.

How ridiculous that thousands of sports fans are denied the opportunity to show their support of their club by this arbitrary and income generating sharp practice.

Please sign this petition to force the Government to have Wembley Stadium justify this money-making practice masquerading as a Health & Safety policy.
